mapper.select: SELECT a.approval_no approvalNo, a.user_no userNo, a.title, a.content, a.reg_time regTime, a.mod_time modTime, a.end_time , b.approval_no approvalNo, b.user_no adminUserNo, b.state, b.seq, b.reg_time lineRegTime, b.mod_time lineModTime FROM APPROVAL.APPROVAL A ,APPROVAL.APPROVAL_LINE B WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = B.APPROVAL_NO AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.approval_no = #{approvalNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY B.SEQ

SELECT a.approval_no approvalNo, a.user_no userNo, a.title, a.content, a.reg_time regTime, a.mod_time modTime, a.end_time , b.approval_no approvalNo, b.user_no adminUserNo, b.state, b.seq, b.reg_time lineRegTime, b.mod_time lineModTime FROM APPROVAL.APPROVAL A ,APPROVAL.APPROVAL_LINE B WHERE A.END_TIME IS NULL AND A.APPROVAL_NO = B.APPROVAL_NO AND B.STATE = 'REQUEST' AND B.USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
